ModMetaData.name: Before the Crash: Backstories
ModMetaData.author: Ostrich-Hungry
ModMetaData.description: Dive into a universe of rich narratives with Before the Crash: Backstories!, a mod that adds meticulously crafted backstories to breathe new life into your colonists, raiders, and wanderers. From battle-scarred veterans to eccentric scientists, shadowy operatives to exiled elites, every pawn now carries a deeper story that shapes their skills and flaws.
